item.title: [HBASE-15662] Hook up JvmPauseMonitor to REST server
item.summary: Hook up JvmPauseMonitor to REST server

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Attaching patch on top of the one for HBASE-15614. Won't apply until it goes in.

-1 overall
